FuncDef:
The bgp yang-mode enable command enables the YANG management mode for BGP VPN instances.
The undo bgp yang-mode enable command disables the YANG management mode for BGP VPN instances.
By default, the YANG management mode of BGP is disabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To use NETCONF YANG to manage BGP VPN instances in huawei-bgp.yang, enable YANG management for the BGP VPN instances on the device or enable the /bgp:bgp/bgp:global/bgp:yang-enable node globally in the huawei-bgp.yang file.
Precautions
If the bgp yang-mode enable command is run, the configurations of BGP instances and their peers and peer groups are changed.
